name: usgrspan
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c2, cusgr), wbr(c0, csubgr, c2))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ USGraph, c2 ∈ USGraph, c0[SubGraph]c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cusgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cusgr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, csubgr, c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cusgr), wbr(c0, csubgr, c2)), wcel(c0, cusgr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ USGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ USGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c0[SubGraph]c2)
⊣ ((c2 ∈ USGraph ∧ c0[SubGraph]c2)→ c0 ∈ USGraph)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cusgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cusgr))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, csubgr, c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cusgr), wbr(c0, csubgr, c2)), wcel(c0, cusgr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ USGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ USGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c0[SubGraph]c2)
⊣ ((c2 ∈ USGraph ∧ c0[SubGraph]c2)→ c0 ∈ USGraph)

stmt.origin: uhgrspansubgr(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, w0)
stmt.pretty: uhgrspansubgr(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, csubgr, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cvtx, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cres(c3, c5)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cuhgr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0[SubGraph]c2)
⊣ c1 =(Vtx ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(iEdg ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c0)= c1)
⊣ (w0 →(iEdg ` c0)=(c3 |` c5))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ UHGraph)

cumulated.origin:

-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cres(c3, c5)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cuhgr))
cumulated.pretty:

⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ USGraph)
⊣ ((c2 ∈ USGraph ∧ c0[SubGraph]c2)→ c0 ∈ USGraph)
⊣ c1 =(Vtx ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(iEdg ` c2)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c0)= c1)
⊣ (w0 →(iEdg ` c0)=(c3 |` c5))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ UHGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c2, cuhgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cusgr))

body.pretty:

comment: A spanning subgraph ` S ` of a simple graph ` G ` is a simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 15-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 16-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 18-Nov-2020.)
